issue.title: [Rust] Preserve order of JSON inferred schema
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4556](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4556). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
serde_json has the ability to preserve order of JSON records read. This feature might be necessary to ensure that schema inference returns a consistent order of fields each time.

I'd like to add it separately as I'd also need to update JSON tests in datatypes.
